brand_info.name: Apple
brand_info.positioning: Premium, design-led consumer technology and services brand built around a tightly integrated hardware-software-services ecosystem.
brand_info.vision: Leave the world better than we found it.
brand_info.mission: Bring the best user experience to customers through innovative hardware, software, and services.
brand_info.origin_story: Founded on April 1, 1976 in Los Altos, California by Steve Jobs, Steve Wozniak, and Ronald Wayne; incorporated as Apple Computer, Inc. on January 3, 1977.

brand_values.brand_promise: Human-centered technology that feels simple, seamless, and trustworthy.
differentiators: Iconic industrial design and UX focus
non_negotiables: No low-quality visuals or materials depiction

psychographics.lifestyle: Design-aware, productivity and creativity-oriented users who value reliability, ease-of-use, and ecosystem continuity.
psychographics.behavior: Prefers cohesive product ecosystems; loyal to brand experience across devices, services, and retail.

logo.usage_rules: Use on clean, uncluttered backgrounds; do not rotate, animate, or apply transparency; do not place on visually cluttered or patterned backgrounds; do not alter the mark.
logo.lockup_behavior: Minimal, centered or corner placement with generous clear space; avoid competing marks near the logo.
logo.safe_area: Minimum clear space equals at least the height of the logo body on all sides; allow more space whenever possible.

color_system.color_usage_rules: Prefer white or near-white fields with high contrast typography; use restrained accent color only when tied to product UI or feature emphasis; avoid busy multi-color palettes.

typography.secondary_font: New York (NY) for editorial accents where appropriate

layout_principles.grid_system: Strict modular grid with generous margins
layout_principles.cta_placement: Subtle, typically below headline or near product; never visually dominant
layout_principles.alignment: Centered or clean left alignment with consistent rhythm

style.camera_feel: Clean, modern, high-resolution clarity with controlled perspective
style.pose_guidelines: Natural, functional gestures; confident but unforced; hands often interacting with product

technical.lighting: Soft, controlled studio or natural light; crisp specular control on materials
technical.contrast: Medium, tuned for legibility and material truth
technical.color_grading: Neutral, accurate product color; restrained saturation

preferred_locations: Clean studio (white, light gray, or black backgrounds)
Everyday real-world environments with low visual noise

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Primary subject; front-and-center or clearly featured
product_presentation.styling_approach: Functional, minimal, modern wardrobe; avoid distracting patterns

visual_dos: Show product truthfully with accurate materials and color
visual_donts: Visual noise that competes with product

can_evolve: Accent colors tied to product UI

digital.tone_adjustment: Ultra-clear, minimal layouts; short sections with scannable hierarchy

platform_behavior.Instagram: High-clarity product and lifestyle moments, minimal copy
platform_behavior.Website: Full-bleed hero sections with large headlines and generous white space

print.cover_rules: Single dominant visual, minimal headline, generous margins
